author: rickhall
msg: Applied memory leak patch from trunk.

author: rickhall
msg: Bundle cache-related changes necessary due to the Module Loader refactoring;
the main change was to return a content loader instead of an array of
strings for resource sources. This cleaned up the System Bundle since it
is now able to delegate to the system class loader, rather than the ugly
"parent" hack that was required in the old Module Loader.

author: rickhall
msg: Minor changes needed to cope with the Module Loader refactoring.

author: rickhall
msg: These changes represent the actual policy implementations for an OSGi R4
framework and, as such, form the core of Felix. To a large degree this code
has not changed too much; it has just been rearranged and refactored where
